sn44.5:1.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ āyasmā ca sāriputto, āyasmā ca mahākoṭṭhiko bārāṇasiyaṃ viharanti isipatane migadāye …pe…
sn44.5:1.3: “Ko nu kho, āvuso, hetu ko paccayo, yenetaṃ abyākataṃ bhagavatā”ti?
sn44.5:1.4: “Rūpe kho, āvuso, avigatarāgassa avigatacchandassa avigatapemassa avigatapipāsassa avigatapariḷāhassa avigatataṇhassa ‘hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’tipissa hoti …pe…
sn44.5:1.5: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’tipissa hoti.
sn44.5:1.9: viññāṇe avigatarāgassa avigatacchandassa avigatapemassa avigatapipāsassa avigatapariḷāhassa avigatataṇhassa ‘hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’tipissa hoti …pe…
sn44.5:1.10: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’tipissa hoti.
sn44.5:1.15: viññāṇe vigatarāgassa vigatacchandassa vigatapemassa vigatapipāsassa vigatapariḷāhassa vigatataṇhassa ‘hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’tipissa na hoti …pe…
sn44.5:1.16: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’tipissa na hoti.
sn44.5:1.17: Ayaṃ kho, āvuso, hetu, ayaṃ paccayo, yenetaṃ abyākataṃ bhagavatā”ti.
